statements: SELECT * FROM player_high_scores;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM player_high_scores WHERE rank > 3 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_high_scores WHERE game_id = 'abcd-1234' ORDER BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM player_high_scores WHERE high_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT player_id, player_name, high_score FROM player_high_scores ORDER BY rank ASC, high_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, high_score FROM player_high_scores WHERE game_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
SELECT player_name, high_score, rank FROM player_high_scores ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_id, high_score, rank FROM player_high_scores WHERE rank > 3 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_id, high_score, rank FROM player_high_scores WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%' OR player_name LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT MAX(high_score) AS max_score, MIN(high_score) AS min_score, AVG(high_score) AS avg_score FROM player_high_scores;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, high_score FROM players ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, ranking FROM players WHERE ranking < 100;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT game_name, developer_name FROM games WHERE developer_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, player_name, high_score FROM players WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC
SELECT player_name, high_score, ranking FROM players WHERE ranking <= 10 ORDER BY ranking ASC
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date, developer_name FROM games WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, high_score, ranking FROM players WHERE high_score >= 200 AND ranking < 50
SELECT game_id, game_name, developer_name FROM games WHERE developer_name LIKE '%Soft%' ORDER BY game_name ASC
SELECT player_id, game_name, score FROM HighScores;
SELECT player_name, email FROM Players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, game_name, rank FROM Rankings ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM Players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_id, game_name, score FROM HighScores WHERE score >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM HighScores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, score, game_name FROM HighScores INNER JOIN Players ON HighScores.player_id = Players.player_id WHERE Players.email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT player_name, rank, game_name FROM Rankings INNER JOIN Players ON Rankings.player_id = Players.player_id WHERE Players.player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_id, game_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM HighScores GROUP BY player_id, game_name;
SELECT player_name, game_name, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY game_name ORDER BY score DESC) AS ranking FROM HighScores INNER JOIN Players ON HighScores.player_id = Players.player_id;
SELECT player_name, register_date FROM Players
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM Games
SELECT player_name, register_date, game_name, release_date FROM Players JOIN Games ON Players.player_id = Games.game_id
SELECT player_name, game_name, score_value FROM Players JOIN Scores ON Players.player_id = Scores.player_id JOIN Games ON Scores.game_id = Games.game_id
SELECT player_name, game_name, rank_value FROM Players JOIN Rankings ON Players.player_id = Rankings.player_id JOIN Games ON Rankings.game_id = Games.game_id
SELECT player_name, register_date FROM Players;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM Games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, score_value FROM Players JOIN Scores ON Players.player_id = Scores.player_id WHERE Scores.score_value > 100;

SELECT player_name, game_name, rank_value FROM Players JOIN Rankings ON Players.player_id = Rankings.player_id JOIN Games ON Rankings.game_id = Games.game_id WHERE Players.player_id = 1 ORDER BY rank_value DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, MAX(score_value) AS highest_score FROM Players JOIN Scores ON Players.player_id = Scores.player_id JOIN Games ON Scores.game_id = Games.game_id GROUP BY player_name, game_name ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM players LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM games WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players p INNER JOIN player_scores ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players p INNER JOIN player_rankings pr ON p.player_id = pr.player_id WHERE rank_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT game_name, total_players, avg_score FROM games g INNER JOIN game_statistics gs ON g.game_id = gs.game_id WHERE highest_score > 1000;
